definition: common North American weed with linear leaves and small discoid heads of yellowish flowers
details:
noun
- common North American weed with linear leaves and small discoid heads of yellowish flowers
= synonyms: horseweed
- any of several North American plants of the genus Erigeron having daisylike flowers
- hairy perennial Eurasian herb with yellow daisylike flowers reputed to destroy or drive away fleas
= synonyms: feabane mullet
